lead_paragraph: Manchester City fans were probably still discussing the wisdom of Pep Guardiola leaving out John Stones when their central defence was sliced open by Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez's precise pass for Theo Walcott's fifth-minute opener.

headline.print_headline: Manchester City Happy to Keep the Faith With Guardiola
headline.main: Manchester City Happy to Keep the Faith With Guardiola
